title: Drawing, "Fabrizio Refusing the Gifts of his Enemies", ca. 1808
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: On recto: Fabrizio rifiuta li doni dei nemici
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Fabrizio Refusing the Gifts of his Enemies", ca. 1808.
ca. 1808. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1922.
